response.answer_text: It would be a good choice to download YouTube videos with an online video downloader. I'd like to recommend 3 to you. 1. VidPaw VidPaw is a new-launched website. It enables users to download videos with up to 8K out put quality. The easy operating process of VidPaw can help everyone get YouTube videos easily even those green hand. Users can also add its extension to websites. Then you can directly turn to this page when you find a video in YouTube.  Pros: * VidPaw supports almost all broswers and able to download videos from more than 1000 sites. * High output quality and high efficiency. * Has no ads and is totally free for use. Cons: * The videos over 720p can only be downloaded with no voice. 2. Video Grabber Video Grabber is also an online HD video downloader, a web-based YouTube downloader. You can search and find videos through it directly even without heading to the YouTube. Apart from downloading, it also offers a function of converting videos you download from YouTube to the formats you like.  Pros: * An all-in-one video downloader allows users to search, find, download and convert videos. * Support downloading videos of 1080P and 4K resolution. Cons: * Before you use every function you need to download a plugin. 3. Catchvideo As it’s one of the best online YouTube downloader available that provides robust downloading capabilities, Catchvideo comes with an intuitive interface, you can save the video file in available qualities without a glitch. Once you acquire the URL of the original video, choose your ideal video format, then it will download as soon as you click the download button.  Pros: * Support downloading videos in full video, video only, audio only modes, with a mp3 conversion function. * Come with a list of popular videos for users to watch and download directly. Cons: * Can’t support 1080P or ultra HD resolution.

I’m never the one to recommend illegal things. Some claim that converting a YouTube video into an MP3 file is not illegal. But that’s something that YouTube would dispute. Technically, it’s not illegal. If it was, YouTube would have taken down the popular converter sites and apps. I know how to download music on a MacBook, so I’ll first share these alternatives for getting free music: Use Soundcloud, which is a great place for discovering free music.Jamendo has a great library of files that have been shared by the artists for free.If you’re determined to get your music from YouTube, you can use a converter. Folx is an amazing app for Mac. It’s fast and easy to use. You just copy the URL from a video, and you’ll get it as an audio file. An app is a better option than a browser-based converter, since it’s faster and it keeps the history of files that you converted.
